channel.title: FLF - Let's Talk Eschatology
channel.description: FIGHT LAUGH FEAST PRESENTS SHOWS PROCLAIMING THE LORDSHIP OF CHRIST OVER ALL OF LIFE.
channel.itunes:author: FLF, LLC

item.title: Megan Basham: "Shepherds For Sale", Andy Stanley, Keller and the Third Way [Let's Talk Eschatology]
item.description:
Megan Basham is a culture reporter for the Daily Wire and author of "Beside Every Successful Man: A Woman's Guide To Having It All. She is a frequent contributor to the Morning Wire, one of the top ten newscasts in the United States. She has also written for the Wall Street Journal, TheTelegraph, First Things, National Review, and World Magazine, where she worked as a film and television editor.

Megan's brand new book, Shepherd's For Sale, serves as a warning of what can happen when a church forgets that true power lies not in the world's wisdom, but in Scripture.
item.author: Dr Josh Howard
item.itunes:author: Dr Josh Howard
item.itunes:summary: Megan Basham: "Shepherds For Sale", How Evangelical Leaders Sold Out, Andy Stanley, Tim Keller and the Third Way

item.title: John-William Noble: How Europe Lost Christianity, Where Presbyterians Got It Wrong [Let's Talk Eschatology]
item.description:
John-William Noble is a pastor of Grace Baptist Church Aberdeen, which he planted in 2019.

John-William is the founder of two christian schools, a Reformed Baptist publisher and the author of two books.

In this episode he discusses the major mistake of Scottish Presbyterians that lead to the ultimate secularization in Scotland, as well as the decline of Christianity overall in Europe.
item.author: Jacob Tanner
item.itunes:author: Jacob Tanner
item.itunes:summary: John-William Noble: How Europe Lost Christianity, Where Scottish Presbyterians Got It Wrong
